column4: Does anyone running Ubuntu on an iBook find the resolution or size of windows a bit too large?
well i know hardware-wise the max resolution is 1024x768
i have an iBook G4 myself, but i dont run ubuntu on it
i have it running at 1024x768 on this laptop im on now and it doesnt really seem too bad.. but it is a lot different than my desktop that i have running at 1600x1200
have you tried using xfce or fluxbox? those seem a bit smaller than gnome
i actually like it a lot better than gnome.. plus its a bit faster than gnome imho
I do too... I run it on my tower.
then click session on the login screen
